REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2501 reute d f BC-ALLIED-SIGNAL-<ALD>-G 03-30 0037

TEXT.TITLE: ALLIED-SIGNAL <ALD> GETS 38.6 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Allied Corp, a division of Allied-Signal Inc, has received a 38.6 mln dlr contract for work on F-15 aircraft avionics maintenance, the Air Force said. reuter
